mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , NICK_NAME , PICTURE_ID , LOGIN_TYPE , LAST_LOGIN_DATE , REG_DTM , REG_ID , MOD_DTM , MOD_ID FROM USER_TABLE

SELECT USER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , NICK_NAME , PICTURE_ID , F_GET_PICTURE_NM(USER_ID) PICTURE_NM , LOGIN_TYPE , LAST_LOGIN_DATE , REG_DTM , REG_ID , MOD_DTM , MOD_ID FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT T3.ROLE_ID , T3.ROLE_NM FROM USER_TABLE T1 , USER_ROLE T2 , ROLES T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T2.ROLE_ID = T3.ROLE_ID ORDER BY T3.ROLE_ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT T3.USER_ID , F_GET_USER_NM(T3.USER_ID) NAME , T3.REG_DTM , T1.PICTURE_ID , F_GET_PICTURE_NM(T3.USER_ID) PICTURE_NM FROM USER_TABLE T1 , FRIEND_TABLE T2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T2.FRIEND_ID = T3.FRIEND_ID AND T1.USER_ID IN (SELECT A3.USER_ID FROM USER_TABLE A1 , FRIEND_TABLE A2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE A3 WHERE A1.USER_ID = T3.USER_ID AND A1.USER_ID = A2.USER_ID AND A2.FRIEND_ID = A3.FRIEND_ID)

SELECT T3.USER_ID , T3.NAME , T1.REG_DTM , T3.PICTURE_ID , F_GET_PICTURE_NM(T3.USER_ID) PICTURE_NM FROM USER_FRIEND_TABLE T1 , FRIEND_TABLE T2 , USER_TABLE T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.FRIEND_ID = T2.FRIEND_ID AND T2.USER_ID = T3.USER_ID AND T3.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT A3.USER_ID FROM USER_TABLE A1 , FRIEND_TABLE A2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE A3 WHERE A1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A1.USER_ID = A2.USER_ID AND A2.FRIEND_ID = A3.FRIEND_ID)

SELECT T3.USER_ID , F_GET_USER_NM(T3.USER_ID) NAME , T1.REG_DTM , F_GET_PICTURE_NM(T3.USER_ID) PICTURE_NM FROM USER_TABLE T1 , FRIEND_TABLE T2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T2.FRIEND_ID = T3.FRIEND_ID AND T3.USER_ID NOT IN ( SELECT A3.USER_ID FROM USER_FRIEND_TABLE A1 , FRIEND_TABLE A2 , USER_TABLE A3 WHERE A1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A1.FRIEND_ID = A2.FRIEND_ID AND A2.USER_ID = A3.USER_ID)

SELECT T3.USER_ID , F_GET_USER_NM(T3.USER_ID) NAME , T1.REG_DTM , F_GET_PICTURE_NM(T3.USER_ID) PICTURE_NM FROM USER_TABLE T1 , FRIEND_TABLE T2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T2.FRIEND_ID = T3.FRIEND_ID
SELECT T1.FRIEND_ID FROM FRIEND_TABLE T1 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} LIMIT 1

SELECT T3.USER_ID , F_GET_USER_NM(T3.USER_ID) NAME , T3.REG_DTM , T1.PICTURE_ID , F_GET_PICTURE_NM(T3.USER_ID) PICTURE_NM FROM USER_TABLE T1 , FRIEND_TABLE T2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId} AND T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T2.FRIEND_ID = T3.FRIEND_ID AND T1.USER_ID IN (SELECT A3.USER_ID FROM USER_TABLE A1 , FRIEND_TABLE A2 , USER_FRIEND_TABLE A3 WHERE A1.USER_ID = T3.USER_ID AND A1.USER_ID = A2.USER_ID AND A2.FRIEND_ID = A3.FRIEND_ID) AND T3.USER_ID NOT IN (SELECT B2.USER_ID FROM GROUP_TABLE B1 , GROUP_USER B2 WHERE B1.GROUP_ID = #{groupId} AND B1.GROUP_ID = B2.GROUP_ID AND B1.GROUP_MST_USER_ID = #{userId} )
